tool_description: GroupDocs.Conversion Cloud is a REST API to assist you in performing document conversion in the cloud for a wide range of document formats.
name: GroupDocs.Conversion Cloud
title: GroupDocs.Conversion Cloud

api_list.name: GetDiscUsage
GetFileVersions

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder.

ModifiedDate.description: File or folder last modified DateTime.

IsLatest.description: Specifies whether the file is (true) or is not (false) the latest version of an file.

api_list.name: GetDocumentMetadata

optional_parameters.name: FilePath
optional_parameters.description: Absolute path to a document in the storage

Author.description: Returns detected document author if applicable to the current document format

BitsPerPixel.description: Returns detected bits per pixel if applicable to the current document format

CreatedDate.description: Returns detected document creation date if it's applicable to the current document format

Height.description: Returns detected height if applicable to the current document format

HorizontalResolution.description: Returns detected horizontal resolution if applicable to the current document format

Layers.description: Returns list of layer names if applicable to the current document format

ModifiedDate.description: Returns detected document modification date if applicable to the current document format

PageCount.description: Gets pages count if applicable to the current document format

Title.description: Returns document title width if applicable to the current document format

VerticalResolution.description: Returns detected vertical resolution if applicable to the current document format

Width.description: Returns detected width if applicable to the current document format

api_list.name: DownloadFile
GetSupportedConversionTypes

optional_parameters.name: FilePath
optional_parameters.description: Absolute path to a document in the storage

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: If provided only supported conversions for specified format will be returned

items.description: Represents information about supported conversion for SourceFormat

api_list.name: ObjectExists

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: File or folder path e.g. '/file.ext' or '/folder'

api_list.name: GetFilesList
StorageExists
